alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 200 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, amateur radio operators reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Powder River Pass, which is also 19 miles southwest of Buffalo, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Amateur radio. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Johnson County. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 268 and 277. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
